ygData.subject: Re: Binding or not...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... In a way I think it s a lot more valid bitch than some. That side of Norrath is very poorly service by gate points, so an expedition and evac return is
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, Oct 04/99, Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...> wrote:
> From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>
>
> >Unless you get gate too, how would binding outside perma
> >help you get back from an evac?
>
> You're right. <chuckle> Disregard that post, it was unfounded.
> hehe, just had to bitch a little.

In a way I think it's a lot more valid bitch than some. That side of
Norrath is very poorly service by gate points, so an expedition and evac
return is definately more painful than anywhere else.

Were you doing a Vox run? Did you succeed?


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
